attributes.name: Frozen Life
attributes.description: "Thousands of years trapped beneath the ice, and yet life still simmers within you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Thousands of years trapped beneath the ice, and yet life still simmers within you."

attributes.name: Frozen Mire
attributes.description: "The grime of winter's end always leaves its mark."
attributes.parsed_description: "The grime of winter's end always leaves its mark."

attributes.name: Frozen Spate
attributes.description: "The icy water stretched out endlessly in front of us, but we continued nonetheless."
attributes.parsed_description: "The icy water stretched out endlessly in front of us, but we continued nonetheless."

attributes.name: Frozen Spellstaff
attributes.description: "The end of the staff appears as if it is magic manifested into a physical form that is frozen solid."
attributes.parsed_description: "The end of the staff appears as if it is magic manifested into a physical form that is frozen solid."

attributes.name: Fuel to the Fire
attributes.description: "Stoke the flames and watch as the fire grows larger than you can imagine."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stoke the flames and watch as the fire grows larger than you can imagine."

attributes.name: Fulgurite Slasher
attributes.description: “The Siren's followers scattered across the beach, gathering glass to forge, and taking care to avoid the freshly fried challenger.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The Siren's followers scattered across the beach, gathering glass to forge, and taking care to avoid the freshly fried challenger.”

attributes.name: Full Moon
attributes.description: "Blessed be the Night Sky Queen. May she guide the tides of your fate."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blessed be the Night Sky Queen. May she guide the tides of your fate."

attributes.name: Funeral Pyre
attributes.description: "Most people think a cremation takes a lot of wood. With this it just takes time."
attributes.parsed_description: "Most people think a cremation takes a lot of wood. With this it just takes time."

attributes.name: Furious Repeater
attributes.description: "This rifle fires off shots faster than you can reload them."
attributes.parsed_description: "This rifle fires off shots faster than you can reload them."

attributes.name: Fury
attributes.description: "A thief you can trust is no thief to you."
attributes.parsed_description: "A thief you can trust is no thief to you."

attributes.name: Fury
attributes.description: "You will know it not only by name, but by taste, smell, and the relief it brings."
attributes.parsed_description: "You will know it not only by name, but by taste, smell, and the relief it brings."

attributes.name: Fury's Call
attributes.description: "When I give the order to loose your arrow, let it fly true and strike down our enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "When I give the order to loose your arrow, let it fly true and strike down our enemies."

attributes.name: Gaea's Revenge
attributes.description: "The earth shook for days without stopping, until everyone forgot what it felt like to be on solid ground."
attributes.parsed_description: "The earth shook for days without stopping, until everyone forgot what it felt like to be on solid ground."

attributes.name: Gaia's Justice
attributes.description: “When the Angry Earth arose from the depths of Aeternum, they brought with them ferocious weapons of imbued wood.”
attributes.parsed_description: “When the Angry Earth arose from the depths of Aeternum, they brought with them ferocious weapons of imbued wood.”

attributes.name: Gaia's Whim
attributes.description: "Her desires flow like rivers, ever changing and unknowable."
attributes.parsed_description: "Her desires flow like rivers, ever changing and unknowable."

attributes.name: Gale Force
attributes.description: "A strong wind seems to knock your enemy down before the hammer even makes contact."
attributes.parsed_description: "A strong wind seems to knock your enemy down before the hammer even makes contact."

attributes.name: Galleon's Spearhead
attributes.description: "Ripped from the front of a crashed galleon, this spearhead is perfect for boarding ships and slaying enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "Ripped from the front of a crashed galleon, this spearhead is perfect for boarding ships and slaying enemies."

attributes.name: Galley Cook's Tenderizer
attributes.description: “Preparing meat on the high seas is no easy task as your ship gets tossed about. A bigger hammer makes preparing meals that much easier.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Preparing meat on the high seas is no easy task as your ship gets tossed about. A bigger hammer makes preparing meals that much easier.”

attributes.name: Gaoler's Light
attributes.description: "It is no mean feat to imprison elemental flame."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is no mean feat to imprison elemental flame."
